comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/68817772@N00] 
True, Wilson participated in El Pacto de La Embajada (the pact of the [American] embassy) in which he ploted with Gen. Victoriano Huerta and Gens. Díaz and Mondragón to overthrow and slain President Madero.
Was the American President, Taft aware of this?
Dr. Roberto Duarte
